name: User Frustration & Pain Points
description: Identifies frustrated customer narratives to prioritize UX fixes and support outreach.
positive_samples: This feature is so confusing, I've been trying for an hour and can't figure it out
Why is this so complicated? It should be much simpler
I'm extremely frustrated with how unreliable this has become
This is the third time this week it's failed. Unacceptable
The onboarding process is way too difficult for new users
Major usability issue: I can't find where to change my settings
This workflow makes no sense and wastes so much time
